Faux Suede Barley Roman Blind (Swift directblinds)

Capture the perfect finish to your windows with this fantastic faux suede Roman Blind. Our Faux Suede Deluxe range of fabric has proven to be one of our most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, this fabric makes sumptuous Roman blinds and curtains to enhance your home interior. The Faux Suede Barley Roman blind is a lovely cream colour and is an excellent way to enhance your home at an affordable price. Quality is important to us and we therefore check your blind at multiple stages in its manufacture to ensure you receive the perfect blindfor your home. Don’t just take our word for it, we are proud that our customers vote us ‘excellent’ on Trustpilot. Product ID: DB-ROM0001 Fabric Colour: Barley Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes Faux Suede Barley Roman Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £15.58 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

This fabric is beautiful within the living room or bedroom, especially when paired with our blackout lining. Our made to measure roman blinds are all handmade within the UK and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling. Being produced from a linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to enliven, you can be confident that this Bumblebee blush pink roman blind is suitable. Made to measure from £26.40 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

A modern geometric design, with a subtle hint of cubist inspiration, our Abstract Arc Tabasco roman blind uses colour to create an optical illusion.  Warm-toned brown and reds with cool cream and blue make up this linen/cotton blend roman blind, resulting in a stunning result. At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman comes with our FREE five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching curtain!
